room_title: Escape room "The Cursed Tomb" by Escape Canton in Canton
review: Great time. Intense, challenging, team building and FUN! Wanted something a little differs this year and this was it. Our host was very accommodating and made the experience great. Can't wait to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Cursed Tomb" by Escape Canton in Canton
review: Wow!!!! Such a fun experience! Very detailed and great puzzle flow! Definitely a must do. Can't wait to play their new games.

room_title: Escape room "The Cursed Tomb" by Escape Canton in Canton
review: We successfully escaped from the cursed tomb! There were 8 of us, 2 adults and 6 middle school kids. Good puzzles and not scary (which was great for our group). Will be back with an adult group to try the scarier rooms.
